thread.title: Margot Coates
thread.title_full: Chocolate Trading Company reviewed by Margot Coates

author: Margot Coates
title: Margot Coates
text:
I bought these for a present for a friend's birthday. The date for the birthday is 27 th January. The use by date is 17 th February 2017! I've been duped. Never again.
Oops! Should have gone to Specsavers. Printing of date is so small I misread the label. Still has 5 months to go! My apologies. Couldn't be more pleased with the product and with the excellent Customer Service.
Rating revised to 5 Star!
